com.jdroid.android.sqlite

Interface Column

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugLogsColumns

    public interface Column
    Represents a column definition.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DTYPE
      Default dtype column name.
      static String ID
      Default id column name.
      static String PARENT_ID
      Default parent id column name.
      static String PRIMARY_KEY
      Primary key constraint
      static String PRIMARY_KEY_AUTOINCREMENT
      Primary key constraint with autoincrement
      static String VALUE
      Default value column name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void addValue(android.content.ContentValues values, T value)
      Adds a the value given value to ContentValues according column definition.
      String getColumnName() 
      DataType getDataType() 
      String getExtraQualifier() 
      Reference getReference()
      Returns a reference if the column contains a foreign key and should be added to reference constraints, otherwise returns null.
      Boolean isOptional() 
      Boolean isUnique() 
      <E> E readValue(android.database.Cursor cursor)
      Reads the value from Cursor according column definition.

        value - to add.

      • readValue

        Reads the value from Cursor according column definition.

        cursor - to get the data.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • getExtraQualifier

        String getExtraQualifier()
        Returns:
        extra qualifiers for the column, like "PRIMARY KEY" or "AUTOINCREMENT".

      • isOptional

        Boolean isOptional()
        Returns:
        the optional

      • isUnique

        Boolean isUnique()
        Returns:
        true if the column should be included in unique constraint.

      • getReference

        Reference getReference()
        Returns a reference if the column contains a foreign key and should be added to reference constraints, otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        the reference.
